TopicTitle: Your avatar is stuck in an elevator with the above poster's avatar, what do you do?

Articles.Content:
As the title says, your avatar is stuck in an elevator with the above person's avatar.

Your avatar is at the top of a really tall building. Around 300 floors to be exact. The elevator is painfully slow, but will get the job done if it's just one floor.

The buttons have all been pushed, so it will be a long time.

Every post counts as a floor. Every floor the above poster's avatar steps out and a new poster's avatar steps in.

Once we hit the bottom floor, same thing except we go up a floor instead of down, and vice versa.

Would your avatar attempt to make small talk? Maybe pull out a shotgun and rob the above avatar?

You gotta do something here to pass the time, you will be here a very, very long time...
I produce a ham sandwich from my pocket and laugh hysterically in a cynical voice.
i magically make a troll face helmet, put it on, and start imitating your laugh
Wag my tail stand on my hindlegs and "smile" for pets.
Calls Jeb and asks him for Sepratrons for the lift, but Jeb says no because he is fitting them to his sofa.

Keep cool, pet the dog, and be classsy as f*ck

Edited August 31, 2013 by AletzN1
Stare at that classy face, and sloooowly move towards it.
Make eye contact, say yes, and slowly back away into a corner.
Just another day in the office...
Warn astropapi1
Pets dog, fiddles with neckerchief.
the last ting you would see are tentacles and this!
hide in the corner of the elevator hoping the lights don't go out
Gives bird seed,what do you do now?
Look the other way...
gets sucked into your jet engine. picks self up from wrecked engine and ashes. "aw, not again!"
Just do nothing.
Hope that this elevator takes me to the surface.
Use the elevator to travel back in time( its secretly the tardis)
Use the force
Takes helmet and trys it on.

Give you a pickaxe.

Please don't eat me.
Remove the fish part of you and eat you.
Slaps you for eating him.
Increase the area in the elevator making it slightly less cramped.
